HELP:
[CMD_KEY]teaminvite (player)

NOTE: You cannot invite a player that is already in a team!
NOTEAM: You are not a part of a team!
ALREADYINTEAM: This player is already in a team!
NOTINTEAM: You are not a part of a team!
NOPERMS: You do not have permissions to send invites!
ALREADYINVITED: This player has already been invited to join your team!
